ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.details: Note ensure you check the msg.sender is the OffRampRouter

crossChainFactoryBySelector(uint64).details: Returns the cross-chain factory address for a given chain selector.

returns._0: The address of the cross-chain factory.

crossChainToken(uint64).details: Returns the cross-chain token address for a given chain selector.

returns._0: The address of the cross-chain token.

estimateAmountOut(address,address,uint12.details: Estimates the amount out for a given swap.

params.tokenIn: The address of the input token.
params.tokenOut: The address of the output token.

returns.amountOut: The estimated amount of output token.

getAmountOut(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Returns the amount out for a given swap.

params.tokenIn: The address of the input token.
params.tokenOut: The address of the output token.

initialize(uint64,address,address,addres.details: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

params._chainlinkToken: The address of the Chainlink token.
params._factoryStorage: The address of the IndexFactoryStorage contract.
params._token: The address of the IndexToken contract.
params._weth: The address of the WETH token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendMessage(uint64,address,bytes,uint8).details: Sends a message to another chain.

setFeeRate(uint8).details: Sets the fee rate, ensuring it is between 0.01% and 1%.

params._factoryStorage: The address of the IndexFactoryStorage contract.

returns._0: true if the interfaceId is supported

params.tokenIn: The address of the input token.
params.tokenOut: The address of the output token.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.notice: Called by the Router to deliver a message. If this reverts, any token transfers also revert. The message will move to a FAILED state and become available for manual execution.
